body: This is a pornhwa titled "Love Limit Exceeded" and you are right, it's on hiatus cuz artist already has a stack of health problems and other issues. It's a pity that this has been on limbo for so long with no ETA, indefinitely until further notice, has so much potential but oh well. My opinion: it's possible that this story might contain plenty of "Korean fuckery sauce" in the future so read at your own risk.
love limit exceeded but sad its on hiatus
